label: Coefficient of variation
Description: Coefficient of variation (measure of relative variability)

label: Season
Description: Model simulates one growing season with different temperatures

label: Planting day of year
Description: Day of the year on which onions are planted

label: Base temperature Onion growth
Description: Base temperature requirement for onions to grow

label: GDD required for field emeregence
Description: GDD requirment to finish field emergence for onions

label: GDD required for maturation
Description: GDD requirement to finish bulbing phase

label: Latitude of Koeln Bonn Airport
column8: Latitude of Koeln Bonn Airport (required for PAR calculation)

label: empirical coefficient used in the Hargreaves radiation formula
Description: used to estimate incoming solar radiation (Rs) from extraterrestrial radiation (Ra) and temperature difference

label: Yield Loss due to suboptimal seed bed
Description: Yield reduction caused by heavy rain or drought and results in suboptimal seed bed preparation
